      • setCurrentRoom

        public void setCurrentRoom(Room room)
        Sets room for the person to spawn in or move to. If person currently is in any room, it is first removed from that room and then placed in the new one.
        Overrides:
        setCurrentRoom in class Entity
        Parameters:
        room - room for the person to spawn in or move to
